section.title: Method Table
section.para: The following table provides links to the documentation for the primary methods and attributes used in working with database connection objects using the ooSQLiteConnection class.

row.entry: Instantiates a new ooSQLite database connection

listitem.para:
The arguments are:
milliseconds
The whole number of milliseconds the busy handler should sleep when a table is locked. If milliseconds is less than or equal to zero all busy handlers are turned off.
This method will aways return OK.

section.title: changes
section.para: Returns the number of database rows that were changed or inserted or deleted by the most recently completed SQL statement on this database connection.

listitem.para: There are no arguments to this method.
The number of changed, deleted, or inserted rows.
There are no arguments for this method.
